articles.description: Bollywood actor Faraaz Khan breathed his last on Wednesday after succumbing to an illness. The actor played pivotal roles in films like Fareb and Mehndi. Here're some lesser-known facts about him.
articles.content:
• Faraaz Khan succumbed to illness and passed away on Wednesday in Bengaluru
  • The actor was known for his roles in films like Mehndi, Fareb and Chand Bujh Gaya among others
